p: All the chemical used were of analytical grade. DPPH, ABTS, ascorbic acid, galantamine ( Lycoris Sp.), potassium phosphate buffer (pH 8.0), acetylcholinesterase ( Electron eel type-VI-S), butyrylcholinesterase (from aquine), acetylcholine iodide, and butyrylcholine iodide were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich, Switzerland. DTNB (5,5-dithio-bis-2-nitrobenzoic acid), 3, 5- Di nitro-salicylic acid, Type I α-glucosidase ( Saccharomyces cerevisiae), Type VI α-amylase (porcine pancreas), PNPG ( p-nitrophenyl-α- D-glucopyranose), and acarbose were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich, Germany.
